EditActions1.label: Save / Discard
EditActions1.onSave: {{Update_Employee.run(() => showAlert('Successfully edited employee #' + Employee_In_Store_Table.selectedRow.employee_id + '!','success'), () => showAlert('Must select row to edit.','error'))}}

children.onClick: {{Fire_Employee_From_Store.run(() => showAlert('Successfully fired employee #' + Employee_In_Store_Table.selectedRow.employee_id + '!','success'), () => showAlert('Error firing employee.','error'))}}
{{Hire_Employee.run(() => showAlert('Successfully hired employee!','success'), () => showAlert('Error hiring employee.','error'))}}
